sentences.en: A long vowel is a long sound as in the word'shoe ".
sentences.cn: 长元音即如“shoe ” 一词中的长音.

sentences.en: He dodged cleverly when she threw her shoe at him.
sentences.cn: 她用鞋子砸向他时,他机敏地闪开了.

sentences.en: He removed a stone from his shoe.
sentences.cn: 他从鞋子里倒出一块石子。

sentences.en: He was bound ( as an ) apprentice to a shoe - maker.
sentences.cn: 他 立约 给鞋匠当学徒.

sentences.en: His shoe had rucked up one corner of the pale rug.
sentences.cn: 他的鞋子把浅色地毯的一角弄皱了。

sentences.en: I sat down and took off my shoes and socks.
sentences.cn: 我坐下来脱掉鞋子和袜子。

sentences.en: I scuffed the heel of my shoe on the stonework.
sentences.cn: 我的鞋跟儿给铺好的石头磨坏了。

sentences.en: I've got some 〔 a piece of 〕 grit in my shoe.
sentences.cn: 我的鞋里进了些〔一粒〕沙子.

sentences.en: if I'd been in your shoes I'd have walked out on him.
sentences.cn: 如果我当时处于你这种情况，我早就离开他了。

sentences.en: Nancy was lacing her shoe up when the doorbell rang.
sentences.cn: 门铃响时南希正在系鞋带。

sentences.en: The most famous people are sometimes as common as an old shoe.
sentences.cn: 最出名的人有时也是很平易近人的.

sentences.en: The shoe fits badly and has rubbed the skin.
sentences.cn: 这鞋不合脚,把皮都磨掉了.

sentences.en: The shoelace caught on the tongue of his shoe.
sentences.cn: 鞋带被他的鞋舌钩住了.

sentences.en: The shoes go on the shoe shelf.
This shoe does not seem to pair up with that one.
sentences.cn: 这只鞋似乎与那只不成对.

sentences.en: This shows where the foot and shoe are in contact.
sentences.cn: 这显示了脚和鞋接触的地方。

sentences.en: What size shoes do you take?
you can save on shoe leather by giving us your instructions over the telephone.
sentences.cn: 你可以打电话告诉我们你的要求，用不着费鞋跑腿。

words.tran_cn: 穿鞋的；装有蹄铁的；有金属包头的
为…钉蹄铁（shoe的过去式及过去分词）

phrases.phrase: be (或 put oneself) in another person's shoes
phrases.tran_cn: 使处于某人的状况；使陷入某人的处境
扔下另一只鞋，做完令人不快的事
继承死者的财产(或地位)
[证劵]优先购股权；[证劵]绿鞋机制

phrases.phrase: if the shoe fits, wear it
phrases.tran_cn: (北美)。 见 （cap条） if the cap fits, wear it

phrases.phrase: the shoe is on the other foot【非正式用语】
phrases.tran_cn: 情况已经逆转；一种不平等的关系已经被倒过来了

phrases.phrase: wait for the other shoe to drop
phrases.tran_cn: (北美，非正式)等着下一个事件（或难题）发生

phrases.phrase: wait for the other shoe to drop&I{【俚语】}
phrases.tran_cn: 推迟行动或决定，直到另一件事情做完或解决
n. 关键所在；困难所在

trans.tran_cn: 鞋，蹄铁，（汽车轮的）制动器，煞车，外胎
trans.tran_en: something that you wear to cover your feet, made of leather or some other strong material
something that you wear to cover your feet, made of leather or some other strong material

trans.tran_cn: 为…钉蹄铁，给…穿上鞋，装防护物
